invocations.description: Will send a private message with content msg using the navigation system to the character charname. The character must be in the same navigation channel as you, and you must be in a navi channel to use this function. To read a received message you must setup a navmessages function, check navsay for an example on how to use the navmessages function.
invocations.exDescription: Will send a private message to Bubble asking him to issue a combo at your currently attacked creature.
